info.title: DynReAct production planning service
info.description: DynReAct mid-term production planning service for steel plants.

get.summary: Get a list of process steps and plants configured for the site
Get a list of available snapshots identified by their timestamps
Get a specific snapshot; the one with largest timestamp <= the provided timestamp

schema.title: Response Aggregate Material Snapshots  Timestamp  Aggregation Get

get.summary: Get a specific snapshot; the one with largest timestamp <= the provided timestamp
Get a specific snapshot; the one with largest timestamp <= the provided timestamp

parameters.name: start

schema.description: Start time. If neither start nor end time are specified, start is set to now
schema.title: Start

parameters.description: Start time. If neither start nor end time are specified, start is set to now

parameters.name: end

schema.description: End time. If neither start nor end time are specified, end is set to now+60d
schema.title: End

parameters.description: End time. If neither start nor end time are specified, end is set to now+60d

post.summary: Invoke cost service for order to order or coil to coil transitions. Global objectives and constraints are ignored.

schema.title: Response Transition Cost Costs Transitions Post

post.summary: Query logistics costs for transfer of material from one equipment to the other.

schema.title: Response Logistics Cost Costs Logistics Post

get.summary: Get the initial plant status for an optimization task.

parameters.name: unit

schema.description: Treat materials as basic unit or orders (default)?
schema.title: Unit

parameters.description: Treat materials as basic unit or orders (default)?

parameters.name: target_weight

schema.description: Target weight. If not specified, it is determined from the snapshot
schema.title: Target Weight

parameters.description: Target weight. If not specified, it is determined from the snapshot

parameters.name: current

schema.description: Order id or material id; determined from snapshot by default
schema.title: Current

parameters.description: Order id or material id; determined from snapshot by default

post.summary: Invoke cost service for order to order or coil to coil transitions, taking into account global objectives and constraints.

schema.title: Response Run Lots Optimization Lots Optimization Post

delete.summary: Stop the lots optimization. Returns true if the optimization was stopped, false if it was not running

schema.title: Response Stop Lots Optimization Lots Optimization  Optimization Id  Delete

get.summary: Query the optimization result. Returns intermediate results while not done.
Long term planning results with start times in the specified period

parameters.name: start

schema.description: Start time. If neither start nor end time are specified, start is set to now.
schema.title: Start

parameters.description: Start time. If neither start nor end time are specified, start is set to now.

parameters.name: end

schema.description: End time. If neither start nor end time are specified, end is set to now+31d
schema.title: End

parameters.description: End time. If neither start nor end time are specified, end is set to now+31d

schema.title: Response Get Longtermplanning Results Longtermplanning Get

get.summary: Long term planning results with start times in the specified period

schema.title: Response Get Longtermplanning Result Longtermplanning  Start   Solution Id  Get

storage_in.title: Storage In
storage_in.description: Default storage location of material waiting to be processed by this equipment

storage_out.title: Storage Out
storage_out.description: Default storage locations of material processed by this equipment

Equipment.title: Equipment
Equipment.description: Equipment, such as a production plant.

end.title: End
end.description: End of downtime, if known. This is the scheduled end if in the future. TODO: do we need to model more uncertain situations?

lot_weight_range.title: Lot Weight Range
lot_weight_range.description: Weight restriction for lots in t

current_material.title: Current Material
current_material.description: Material ids belonging to the currently processed order, if not the complete order

current.title: Current
current.description: DEPRECATED: use current_order and current_coils instead. (Either a coil id or order id)

previous.title: Previous
previous.description: DEPRECATED: use previous_order instead. (Either a coil id or order id)

equipment_status.description: Optimization status, typically retrieved either from a previous optimization run, or from the ...init function

status.title: Status
status.description: 1: created; 2: blocked; 3: released; 4: in progress; 5: completed

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: Convenience field for storing the total lot weight. Must be equal to the sum of the order weights. In tons.

default_select_predecessors_lot.title: Default Select Predecessors Lot
default_select_predecessors_lot.description: A list of process steps at which scheduled orders are usually included in the order backlog for lot creation

default_select_predecessors_all.title: Default Select Predecessors All
default_select_predecessors_all.description: A list of process steps at which all orders (scheduled or not) are usually included in the order backlog for lot creation

default_iterations.title: Default Iterations
default_iterations.description: Default number of iterations if no process-specific number is specified

primary_classes.title: Primary Classes
primary_classes.description: References to the MaterialClasses in primary_category.classes. For the time being only a single entry is supported.

LotCreationStructureSettings.title: LotCreationStructureSettings
LotCreationStructureSettings.description: Defines a hierarchy for structure categories in the mid term planning;

orders.title: Orders
orders.description: Orders to include in the optimization.

trace_results.title: Trace Results
trace_results.description: Set to true in order to store all intermediate results

results.title: Results
results.description: Note: if trace_results in the input data was False, this list will contain a single entry. Otherwise all intermediate results

objective_function.title: Objective Function
objective_function.description: Values of the objective function for all intermediate results, irrespectively of whether trace_results is set or not

order_position.title: Order Position
order_position.description: @deprecated: 1-based index of material in order; note that this always refers to a lot

order_positions.title: Order Positions
order_positions.description: 1-based index of material in order for specific lots (keys: lot id)

current_storage.title: Current Storage
current_storage.description: Note: this field is only relevant for short-term planning. The mid-term planning is based on current_equipment only.

classes.title: Classes
classes.description:
Mutually exclusive material classes. It is assumed
that every material and order can be assigned to exactly one class within the category.

process_steps.title: Process Steps
process_steps.description: Optional list of process steps for which the category is potentially relevant in the mid-term planning.

category.title: Category
category.description: A reference to the material category this class belongs to.

allowed_equipment.title: Allowed Equipment
allowed_equipment.description: Keys: process ids, values: equipment ids.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: A class can be assigned the default role within a material category.

new_equipment.title: New Equipment
new_equipment.description: New equipment the order or material is transferred to

order.title: Order
order.description: Order to be transferred to new equipment

material.title: Material
material.description: Optional: individual material from the order to be transferred.

source.title: Source
source.description: Identifier specifying the source of the long-term targets.

production_targets.title: Production Targets
production_targets.description:
Production targets for the planning period by material class. Note that the material classes are not disjoint, 
only those belonging to a single material category are. Keys: material class ids, values: tons

scheduler.title: Scheduler
scheduler.description: Identifier specifying the source of the mid-term targets.

sub_periods.title: Sub Periods
sub_periods.description:
A chronological list of non-overlapping time intervals within the larger planning period,
typically corresponding to production shifts.

production_sub_targets.title: Production Sub Targets
production_sub_targets.description: Production targets for the planning sub periods. Keys: process ids, values: list of production targets, covering all planning sub periods chronologically.

MidTermTargets.title: MidTermTargets
MidTermTargets.description:
Production targets assigned to shorter periods such as days or shifts.
Note: this class extends LongTermTargets in order to retain information about its source.

additive_costs.title: Additive Costs
additive_costs.description:
The sum of individual components that are monotonously increasing with respect to adding orders; excluding for instance the 
weight_deviation, lot_size_deviation and structure_deviation components, but potentially also certain custom parts.
If unset, the mentioned values are subtracted from total_value.

transition_costs.title: Transition Costs
transition_costs.description: Penalty for order to order transitions

weight_deviation.title: Weight Deviation
weight_deviation.description: Penalty for deviating from the targeted production size

lot_size_deviation.title: Lot Size Deviation
lot_size_deviation.description: Penalty for deviating from the targeted lot sizes

structure_deviation.title: Structure Deviation
structure_deviation.description: Penalty for deviating from the targeted material structure

ObjectiveFunction.title: ObjectiveFunction
ObjectiveFunction.description: Note that this class may have use-case dependent extra fields

actual_weight.title: Actual Weight
actual_weight.description: Sum of individual material weights in t

material_count.title: Material Count
material_count.description: Number of units in this order

material_classes.title: Material Classes
material_classes.description: Keys: material category id, values: material class ids

lot_position.title: Lot Position
lot_position.description: DEPRECATED: use lot_positions instead. (1-based index of order in lot)

lot_positions.title: Lot Positions
lot_positions.description: 1-based index of order in lots, by process step

OrderAssignment.title: OrderAssignment
OrderAssignment.description: "Unassigned" is realized in terms of equipment=-1, lot="", lot_idx=-1

target_fct.title: Target Fct
target_fct.description: Current value of the target function

delta_weight.title: Delta Weight
delta_weight.description: Deviation from target weight in t. Positive for missing tonnage.

material_structure.title: Material Structure
material_structure.description: Keep track of material classes. Outer key: category id, inner key: class id; special keys "_sum" represent the total/aggregated values

main_category.title: Main Category
main_category.description: For nested structure planning, the main category.

nested_material_structure.title: Nested Material Structure
nested_material_structure.description:
Keep track of nested material classes. Only used in case of nested structure targets. 
Outermost key: class id for main category, middle key: sub category id, innermost key: class id; special keys "_sum" represent the total/aggregated values.

PlanningData.title: PlanningData
PlanningData.description: This class holds the internal state of the optimization algorithm

name_short.title: Name Short
name_short.description: Short name uniquely identifying the process2.

process_group.title: Process Group
process_group.description: Id for a group of processes.

lot_sizes.title: Lot Sizes
lot_sizes.description: The target lot size can be specified either per equipment, or globally for all resources of the process

total_size.title: Total Size
total_size.description: The preselected target size in tons for the lot creation. It can be adapted by the user. Either a global setting for the process step, or individual settings per equipment.

default_iterations.title: Default Iterations
default_iterations.description: Default number of iterations for the process step

target_structure.title: Target Structure
target_structure.description: Produced quantity by material class id, in t. This may be a nested model, in case a hierarchical structure is needed. Special key "_sum" represents the total/aggregated value.

ProductionPlanning-Input.title: ProductionPlanning
ProductionPlanning-Input.description: The optimization needs to generate an object of this type

target_structure.title: Target Structure
target_structure.description: Produced quantity by material class id, in t. This may be a nested model, in case a hierarchical structure is needed. Special key "_sum" represents the total/aggregated value.

ProductionPlanning-Output.title: ProductionPlanning
ProductionPlanning-Output.description: The optimization needs to generate an object of this type

material_weights.title: Material Weights
material_weights.description: Produced quantity by material class id, in t. This may be a nested model, in case a hierarchical structure is needed. The special value "_sum" represents the total weight.

logistic_costs.title: Logistic Costs
logistic_costs.description:
Logistic costs for transfer of a complete order(?) from one plant to another (only within a single process stage, not considering
transfer costs between processes)

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The timestamp serves as the unique snapshot id

inline_material.title: Inline Material
inline_material.description: Material ids currently being processed. Keys: plant ids, values: list of materials references.

lots.title: Lots
lots.description: Lots by plant ids. Keys: plant id, values: Lots

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.description: Equipment served by this storage primarily.

material_constraints.description: Constraints on the type of material supported by this storage.

filling_level.title: Filling Level
filling_level.description: Total filling level. Must be a value between 0 and 1.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The timestamp when the level was recorded or for which it is predicted.

material_levels.title: Material Levels
material_levels.description: Material-specific filling levels in the range 0 - 1, referring to the total storage capacity. Keys: material class ids.
